Procedure.description:
Procedure Purpose: FCI Activation (N)
Procedure Version: 6 Responsibility: Julien Rogissart Last Modified Date: 09.03.2023
Change History:
Version 6: (CT - 09.03.2023) Procedure updated as per AR/6801
Version 5.1: (JRo - 03.02.2023) Verify the position of the COM (in Shutter position - FASESG9Z) before executing recom-23 (steps P3.B1.A1.A1 to P3.B1.A1.A8).
Version 5: (JRo - 30.01.2023) - *** Procedure updated wrt PST COM recommendation-23 ***: Need to move the COM wheel to shutter_ref position before reaching heater mode. After the shutter_safe command, the COM is in shutter as observed by the plateform via the BSMs, but , as observed by the ICU, (optical switched) the COM wheel is not in shutter. Going to heater warm up mode with COM not in shutter ref would trigger an FDIR ==> SOR. Step P3.B1 created (with sub-steps P3.B1.A1 to P3.B1.A8)
Version 4: (CRN - 26.01.2023) - *** Procedure updated wrt PST COM recommendation-16 ***: Step P.3.B1.A4 (Switch‐Off FCI STC) removed.
Version 3: (JRo - 26.01.2023) - *** Procedure updated wrt PST COM recommendation-13 ***: During the FCI switch ON to decontamination operation, it is recommended to set at the beginning of the sequence the maximum power granted for the Platform thermal control from 1000W to 720W: Remove the step P.2.B1.A1, which sets the peak power limit to 500W. TCS_AJ_SF_POWER_LIM_MAX_W shall be set by ground operator by TC(152,128) to 720W. In N_FCI_I700, the step P.2.B1.A1 (before execution of N_FCI_701: “FCI Switch ON to STANBY mode”) should be replaced by these 2 TCs: ‐ TC T99C0V3P “Set AJ TCS Heater Power Limit Max” with parameter: o T99H00VX = 720 ‐ T99C0V4P Report Value of Heater Power Limit o Check: T99EA00W.raw‐value == 720
- *** Procedure updated wrt PST COM recommendation-16 ***:
Version 2: (CT - 10.10.2022) - Procedure updated in step p.5 to define HKTM Packet 115 for FWP phase monitoring as per AIM 246488. - Procedure updated as per AIM 225572 & AIM 225504 (FOM06).
Version 1: (CT - 18.01.2022) - Copied from FOM procedure N_FCI_I200 version 1 (delivered in FOM5) - Procedure Description field updated according to EUMETSAT template; - Procedure History field erased and restarted from Version 1; - Procedure updated to cover only the activation of nominal equipment. Additionally, procedure allows partial activation to/from intermediate modes. PF commanding such as FCI macro mode update and STC switch off have been moved from the instrument procedure to the parent.
Procedure Objectives:
- This System procedure activates FCI from SURVIVAL mode to WAIT mode with Nominal equipment only. - Procedure allowes partial activation (mode lower than WAIT) and activation resumption (from a mode higher that SURVIVAL)
Procedure Overview:
This procedure - checks the pre-conditions prior activation; - depending on arguments values, performes activation calling the related instrument procedures; - checks post-conditions.
Procedure Pre-conditions: FCI in any mode lower than WAIT, SAT in FPM/NOM mode.
Procedure Constraints: None
Spacecraft Configuration: FPM/NOM
Ground Segment Configuration: None
Remarks: None
Procedure.title: FCI Activation (N)
Procedure.author: tranquilli_OPRE
Procedure.hierarchy: Child Procedures: MTI1::N_FCI_I701 called by steps: P.2.B1.A4 Default::N_FCI_I118 called by steps: P.3.B2.A1 MTI1::N_FCI_I703 called by steps: P.3.B2.A2 Default::N_FCI_I119 called by steps: P.4.B1.A2 MTI1::N_FCI_I705 called by steps: P.4.B1.A3 Default::N_FCI_I120 called by steps: P.5.B1.A2 MTI1::N_FCI_I707 called by steps: P.5.B1.A3
Procedure.history: Version 6: (CT - 09.03.2023) Procedure updated as per AR/6801

ProcedureArgument.name: END_MODE
ProcedureArgument.description: FCI mode at end of activation

ProcedureArgument.name: E2P_Bank
ProcedureArgument.description: Bank to load SW image from

step.description: The satellite mode has to be in NOM/FPM mode
step.title: Check Satellite Mode
Check SHUTTER position reading from PF
FCI SURVIVAL MECHANISMS UNLOCKED to STANDBY
TC T99C0V - Set AJ TCS Heater Power Limit Max to 720W
Report Value of Heater Power Limit (T99C0V4P)

argument.name: E2P_Bank
argument.description: ank to load SW image from

step.title: Update PF macro mode for FCI
Set FCI Macro Mode to PFCI_STBY
Check FCI macro mode is PFCI_STBY
Dump and Check FCI Configuration Table

StepBody.message: Check reported Configuration table in FASTMPKC000A. If NOK, update FCI Conf Table with C_FCI_I020.

step.title: Move the COM wheel to shutter_ref position before reaching heater mode
Switch ON motors relays with TC(208,6) FASCS01K
Switch ON LCL with TC(208,4) FASCS01H
Sent TC(208,20) to unlock COM motor FASCS01Y
Sent TC go to Reference position for the COM motor TC(208,21) FASCS01Z
Verify the COM is in shutter position
Sent TC(208,19) to relock COM motor FASCS01X
Switch OFF LCL with TC(208,5) FASCS01J
Switch OFF motors relays with TC(208,7) FASCS01L
N_FCI_I118 - Check STANDBY mode target Temperatures

StepBody.title: FCI Check OTL temperatures before going to Heater Mode

step.title: Update PF macro mode for FCI
Set FCI Macro Mode to PFCI_WAIT
Check FCI macro mode is PFCI_WAIT
N_FCI_I119 - Check HEATERWARMUP mode target Temperatures

StepBody.title: FCI Check OTL temperatures before going to CONFIGURATION

step.title: Check CCU in Cold Plateau phase
N_FCI_I120 - Check CONFIGURATION mode target Temperatures

StepBody.title: FCI Check OTL temperatures before going to WAIT

step.description: Waiting duration of 10 hours shall be applied before entering Observation mode to ensure stability of detectors as required in §4.6.5.5 of FCI FOM v7.
step.title: Wait 10 h
Define FCI HK for WP monitoring
